\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{fit,calc}

\begin{document}

\begin{tikzpicture}[
myrect/.style={
  rectangle,
  draw,
  inner sep=0pt,
  fit=#1}
]
\def\xd{0.5}

\coordinate (xc) at (\xd/2,\xd/2);
\coordinate (xr) at (\xd/2-0.1,\xd/2-0.1);

\def\rect#1#2#3#4{\coordinate (xa) at ($(#1*\xd,#2*\xd)+(xc)-(xr)$);
\coordinate (xb) at ($(#3*\xd,#4*\xd)+(xc)+(xr)$);
\node[myrect={(xa) (xb)}] {};
}

\rect{0}{-1}{4}{-1};
\rect{3}{4}{4}{-1};


\end{tikzpicture}

\end{document}
